summary: This is an internal email from July 2, 2020, congratulating a team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell earlier that day. The sender praises the team's work in building a difficult case based on old conduct and mentions an upcoming press conference by Audrey.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email is her arrest. She is described as 'a woman very worthy of criminal prosecution.'

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who will be holding a press conference at 12 regarding the arrest.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in the morning. The email congratulates the team responsible for building the case leading to her arrest.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Arrest
events.description: Audrey is scheduled to hold a press conference at 12 regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The case against Maxwell was described as not inevitable, but the result of 'extraordinary amount of work and perseverance and creativity' by a team.
The criminal conduct forming the basis of the case is described as being older than the team's paralegals, indicating it involved historical allegations.
